title: Only in Time
description: Time doesnâ€™t always mend a broken heart.Jonah McCabe made a horrible mistake six years ago that cost him his chance at happiness. Then fate interceded. A last minute favor has him coming face to face with his past. Every beautiful inch of it. Her laughter still echoed in his mind. As did the pain in her voice the day she left. Can he make things right in a race against the clock, or will time continue to work against him?
author: Kelli McCracken
